sculpt.game_info: To win this Sculpt, choose an artist from your team who can get you to guess the answer by sculpting the subject out of putty

draw_blind.game_info: To win this Draw Blind, choose an artist who can get you to guess the answer by drawing clues on paper with no talking, letters or symbols. The artist's eyes must stay closed

draw.game_info: To win this Draw, choose an artist who can get you to guess the answer by drawing clues on paper with no talking, letters or symbols

multiple_choice.game_info: To win this Multiple Choice, your team must correctly answer the multiple-choice question above

true_false.game_info: To win this True or False, your team must determine whether the statement above is true or false

fact_me.game_info: To win this Fact Me, your team must correctly answer the question above

copy.game_info: To win this Copy, choose a performer from your team who can get you to guess the answer by acting like the famous person or character. The performer can talk like the person but cannot say names of people or places

humalong.game_info: To win this Humalong, choose a performer from your team who can get you to guess the song by humming or whistling with no lyrics or gestures

puppet.game_info: To win this Puppet, choose a performer from your team who can get you to guess the answer by moving a team-mate's arms and legs like a puppet, with no talking or sound effects. The puppet can help guess the answer

charades.game_info: To win this Charades, choose a performer from your team who can get you to guess the answer by acting out silect clues

team_spelling.game_info: To win this Team Spelling, your team must work together to spell the word above backwards on the first try without writing it down. All players on your team will take alternating turns, adding one letter at a time to spell the word in reverse

spelling.game_info: To win this Spelling, choose a speller from your team who can spell the word above backwards on the first try without writing it down

anagram.game_info: To win this Anagram, your team must rearrange the letters above to find the answer
